text: Need Peyton Stewart for Sportsgirl campaign. Budget around $6,976, looking for 3 x Media interview, 3 x 15-second TikTok, 1 x Pinterest pin, 1 x 10-minute unboxing. 6 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs November 2025. Usage rights for 6 months. Engagement period: 2 months. Need to confirm: exclusivity period
